name: Development Environment Setup
tagline: A quick setup script to help newcomers install git, brew, psql, django, heroku toolbelt, and more!
body:
# Development Environment Setup

This script helps people set up their Terminal for development.

Installs:
- git
- Homebrew (Mac only)
- Heroku Toolbelt
- pip/Django
- rbenv/rvm/Rails
- Postgres
- MySQL

# Why

I created this project because I looked for really simple scripts that installed a lot of common developer tools all at once, for all operating systems. I couldn't find something that satisfied all of my requirements, so I created one.

# Todo:

- Support non-Debian based Linux systems
- Shoot me an [email](mailto:sameet.sapra@gmail.com), or better yet, post an issue, if you'd like to see more added or if there's a bug on your environment!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
